explains: n. 白刃战；肉搏战；头接头

sentences.en: They are set to meet head-to-head in next week's final.
sentences.cn: 他们将在下个星期的决赛中正面交锋。

sentences.en: Missouri then won a head-to-head tiebreaker with Colorado.
sentences.cn: 密苏里队后来在与科罗拉多队正面交锋的加时赛中取得了胜利。

sentences.en: Canadian business cannot compete head-to-head with American business.
sentences.cn: 加拿大企业无力同美国企业正面交锋。
